item.title: #en @ 1487479981890363393
item.description: Based on the NIH OpenData portal of aggregate in vitro data against Omicron, tix/cil has 10-100-fold decreased activity (greater loss of activity for tix than cil), but sotrovimab only has a 2-4-fold loss of activity.
